LamBox.Empty:
  mutual inductive(s):
    Empty
      constructors:

Mutual.Odd:
  mutual inductive(s):
    Odd
      constructors: succ (1 arg(s))
    
    Even
      constructors:
        zero (0 arg(s))
        succ (1 arg(s))

Mutual.Nat:
  mutual inductive(s):
    Nat
      constructors:
        zero (0 arg(s))
        succ (1 arg(s))

Mutual.oddNat:
  constant declaration:
    body: μrec [0] :=
            0: λ _ →
                 case<Mutual.Odd{0},0> @0 of λ<[_]> Mutual.Nat{0}{1} (@2 @0)
            1: λ _ →
                 case<Mutual.Odd{1},0> @0 of
                   λ<[]> Mutual.Nat{0}{0}
                   λ<[_]> Mutual.Nat{0}{1} (@3 @0)

Mutual.test:
  constant declaration:
    body: Mutual.oddNat Mutual.Odd{0}{0} Mutual.Odd{1}{0}

Mutual.evenNat:
  constant declaration:
    body: μrec [1] :=
            0: λ _ →
                 case<Mutual.Odd{0},0> @0 of λ<[_]> Mutual.Nat{0}{1} (@2 @0)
            1: λ _ →
                 case<Mutual.Odd{1},0> @0 of
                   λ<[]> Mutual.Nat{0}{0}
                   λ<[_]> Mutual.Nat{0}{1} (@3 @0)
main program: [Mutual.test]
